sentences.text: Listen-Communicate-Show -LRB- LCS -RRB- is a new paradigm for human interaction with data sources .
We integrate a spoken language understanding system with intelligent mobile agents that mediate between users and information sources .
We have built and will demonstrate an application of this approach called LCS-Marine .
Using LCS-Marine , tactical personnel can converse with their logistics system to place a supply or information request .
The request is passed to a mobile , intelligent agent for execution at the appropriate database .
Requestors can also instruct the system to notify them when the status of a request changes or when a request is complete .
We have demonstrated this capability in several field exercises with the Marines and are currently developing applications of this technology in new domains .

kg2text: LCS-Marine implements the Listen-Communicate-Show (LCS) paradigm, which is designed to enhance human interaction with data sources through spoken language understanding and intelligent mobile agents. This approach, referred to as LCS-Marine, is an application of the broader LCS concept. The Listen-Communicate-Show methodology serves as a new paradigm for facilitating communication between tactical personnel and their logistics system. In practical demonstrations, this capability has been showcased in several field exercises, allowing tactical personnel to place information requests effectively. Requestors, who are users of the LCS-Marine system, can instruct the system to process their requests, and in turn, the system notifies them about the status of these requests. Overall, the LCS-Marine application exemplifies the innovative use of technology to streamline logistics management in military operations.

The applications of this technology are being developed in new domains, showcasing the versatility of the Listen-Communicate-Show paradigm beyond its initial military logistics context. Tactical personnel, who are a subset of users, can converse with the logistics system to place requests for supplies or information. These requests are processed by intelligent mobile agents, which mediate between users and various information sources. The status of a request changes as it is processed, indicating whether it is complete or still pending. The system, which encompasses the logistics management software, has a broader term of applications, reflecting its various uses. Additionally, the spoken language understanding system, a key component of the technology, facilitates human interaction with data sources, enhancing the efficiency of communication. Overall, the technology is not only developing applications in new domains but also enriching the interaction between tactical personnel and the logistics system through intelligent mobile agents.

The spoken language understanding system integrates with intelligent mobile agents, enabling these agents to effectively mediate between various information sources. These intelligent mobile agents execute tasks at the appropriate database, which serves as a specific repository for processing requests. Notably, data sources encompass a broader category that includes information sources, while the appropriate database is a subset of the larger database category. Additionally, several field exercises, which are practical demonstrations, fall under the broader term of field exercises. The status of a request, indicating its current state, is also categorized under the broader term of status. Furthermore, intelligent mobile agents are a specific type of intelligent agent, highlighting their role in utilizing artificial intelligence to perform tasks autonomously.
